location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'SKETCH MAP OF THE UNSURVEYED QATAR PENINA FROM THE BEST AVAILABLE AUTHORITIES SHOWING THE DISPUTED BOUNDARY'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper with manuscript additions in pencil and crayon.Dimensions: 273 x 302mm, on sheet 455 x 418mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map produced by the War Office, showing eastern Saudi Arabia and the Qatar Peninsula (abbreviated as 'Penina' on the map). The map depicts various existing and proposed lines for the boundary of Saudi Arabia and Qatar, including four printed lines, which are labelled below the map, plus a fifth line drawn in green crayon, which is unlabelled.
